name: Connexease
description:
Connexease is an omnichannel communication management platform available on web, mobile, and as a widget. Businesses can seamlessly enable and manage customer interactions across WhatsApp, Instagram DM and Comments, Messenger, Telegram, Live Chat, Trendyol Hepsiburada, Google Reviews, and Google Play and App Store Comments from a single interface.

With features such as bulk messaging, cart reminder messages, scheduled actions, and automated agent assignment, Connexease streamlines customer engagement, enhances sales, and improves response times.

Connexease makes it easier and more efficient than ever to connect with customers on their preferred platforms, helping businesses scale their customer support, sales, and marketing operations effortlessly.
focus_areas: Omnichannel Customer Service: team inbox, analytics, mobile app, extension
Broadcast & Bulk Messages: Reach the right customers with targeted broadcasts and segmented campaigns.
Marketing Automation: Automate engagement with drip marketing, scheduled campaigns, intelligent marketing triggers
